education.description: Focusing on advanced System-on-Chip architectures for low-power and high-performance computing...
Specialized in VLSI design with a focus on digital and mixed-signal circuits...

experience.description: Conducting research on optimized System-on-Chip (SoC) architectures for low-power applications...
Worked on the development of high-speed communication protocols for embedded systems...

projects.title: RISC-V Based Processor Design
projects.description: Designed and implemented a 5-stage pipelined RISC-V processor with branch prediction and cache memory on FPGA

projects.title: Machine Learning Hardware Accelerator
projects.description: Developed a custom hardware accelerator for convolutional neural networks with 5x performance improvement over CPU implementations

projects.title: Low-Power IoT Sensor Node
projects.description: Created an ultra-low power sensor node for environmental monitoring with 6-month battery life

projects.title: Python Framework for Hardware Verification
projects.description: Built a Python-based verification framework for ASIC designs that reduced verification time by 40%

projects.title: FPGA-Based Image Processing System
projects.description: Implemented real-time image processing algorithms on FPGA with HDMI input/output capability

projects.title: Approximate Computing for Neural Networks
projects.description: Researched and implemented approximate computing techniques for neural network inference, achieving 3x energy efficiency

projects.title: Open-Source EDA Tool Development
projects.description: Contributing to open-source EDA tools for analog circuit design and simulation

projects.title: Custom CPU Core for Edge AI
projects.description: Designing a specialized CPU core optimized for edge AI applications with custom instructions
